text: (Aey Muhammad), ab jo yeh log intezar kar rahey hain to iske siwa ab aur kya baki reh gaya hai ke Malaika hi aa pahunchein, ya tere Rubb ka faisla saadir ho jaye? Is tarah ki dhitayi inse pehle bahut se log kar chuke hain, phir jo kuch unke saath hua woh unpar Allah ka zulm na tha balke unka apna zulm tha jo unhon ne khud apne upar kiya
